directions: Blend bananas, almond milk, and honey together in a blender until smooth. Pour banana mixture into ice pop molds and freeze until firm, 8 hours to overnight. Run warm water over the mold to release ice pops.
ingredients: 1 cup unsweetened vanilla-flavored almond milk (such as Almond Breeze®)
title: Gluten-Free and Dairy-Free Vanilla Banana Pops
